article_text:
It’s commonly asserted that long-term care coverage isn’t cheap. And in some parts of the country, it really isn’t cheap.

As costs for long-term care coverage continue to climb, a study from New York Life has identified the most expensive markets in the country for long-term care.

article_metadata.sailthru.author: Kathryn Mayer
article_metadata.description: A new study from New York Life has identified the most expensive markets in the country for long-term care.

og.title: 5 most expensive LTC markets

article_summary:
As costs for long-term care coverage continue to climb, a study from New York Life has identified the most expensive markets in the country for long-term care.
It’s commonly asserted that long-term care coverage isn’t cheap.
And in some parts of the country, it really isn’t cheap.
